name: Parliamentary High School
description:
Parliamentary High School is a text based dating game where your goal is to eventually choose who you want to ask out to Prom. Think of it as a choose your own adventure style game, but where the adventure you embark on is Love. 

There's one day left before prom nigh and choices and interactions with people during that day will determine who you ask out (and whether they'll accept or reject you), so be careful! You only have one shot to get it right.

Will you choose love? Or vote no confidence? You decide!

Game takes roughly 30-45 mins to complete.

N.B: If you like this game and would like to see it's creator make more, consider making a donation. The recommended amount is 3$, but you can donate as much (or as little) as you'd like. Thank you for playing!

DISCLAIMER: Some names and identifying details have been changed to protect the privacy of individuals.

This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, businesses, places, events, locales, and incidents are either the products of the author’s imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
